name: Phantom Idol
jpTips:
If you didn't obtain a 4★ from the previous 9 draws for these contracts, the next draw will have the Flat 1 rate, which guarantees a 4★ or higher.
If you didn't obtain a 5★ from the previous 79 draws, the next draw will have the Flat 2 rate, which guarantees a 5★.
The status for Flat Rates does not apply to other contracts.

The listed rates have been rounded to the fourth decimal place and may not add up to 100%.
For contracts, these rates apply to each draw. If an item has a rate of 1%, you are not guaranteed that item within 100 draws. The same item may also appear more than once.

name: Chance Most Wanted Idol Contracts
jpTips:
If you didn't obtain a 4★ from the previous 9 draws for these contracts, the next draw will have the Flat 1 rate, which guarantees a 4★ or higher.
If you didn't obtain a 5★ from the previous 79 draws, the next draw will have the Flat 2 rate, which guarantees a 5★.

After you obtain a non-Most Wanted Phantom Thief, if a Phantom Thief of the same rarity appears in the next or subsequent draws, one Most Wanted Phantom Thief will appear.
This Special Most Wanted Draw will be valid until you obtain a Most Wanted Phantom Thief of the same rarity.
The status for Flat Rates and Special Most Wanted Draws applies to all contracts that use the same ticket, regardless of the event period.

The listed rates have been rounded to the fourth decimal place and may not add up to 100%%.
For contracts, these rates apply to each draw. If an item has a rate of 1%%, you are not guaranteed that contract within 100 draws. The same item may also appear more than once.
Some rates have been adjusted to account for Most Wanted contracts.

name: Arms Deals
jpTips:
If you didn't obtain a 4★ from the previous 9 draws for these contracts, the next draw will have the Flat 1 rate, which guarantees a 4★ or higher.
If you didn't obtain a 5★ from the previous 69 draws, the next draw will have the Flat 2 rate, which guarantees a 5★.

After you obtain a non-Most Wanted weapon, if a weapon of the same rarity appears in the next or subsequent draws, one Most Wanted weapon will appear.
This Special Most Wanted Draw will be valid until you obtain a Most Wanted weapon of the same rarity.
The status for Flat Rates and Special Most Wanted Draws applies to all contracts that use the same type of coins, regardless of the event period.

The listed rates have been rounded to the fourth decimal place and may not add up to 100%.
For contracts, these rates apply to each draw. If an item has a rate of 1%, you are not guaranteed that item within 100 draws. The same item may also appear more than once.
Some rates have been adjusted to account for Most Wanted contracts.

name: Targeted Most Wanted Idol Contracts
jpTips:
If you didn't obtain a 4★ from the previous 9 draws for these contracts, the next draw will have the Flat 1 rate, which guarantees a 4★ or higher.
If you didn't obtain a 5★ from the previous 109 draws, the next draw will have the Flat 2 rate, which guarantees a 5★.

After you obtain a non-Most Wanted Phantom Thief, if a Phantom Thief of the same rarity appears in the next or subsequent draws, a Most Wanted Phantom Thief will appear.
This Special Most Wanted Draw will be valid until you obtain a Most Wanted Phantom Thief of the same rarity.
The status for Flat Rates and Special Most Wanted Draws applies to all similar "targeted" contracts, regardless of the event period.

The listed rates have been rounded to the fourth decimal place and may not add up to 100%%.
For contracts, these rates apply to each draw. If an item has a rate of 1%%, you are not guaranteed that contract within 100 draws. The same item may also appear more than once.
Press [Contract Rates] for more details.
